t: 6 French Lingerie Brands Parisians Swear By - InStyle
s: Eres is a trailblazer as the Parisian brand revolutionized swimwear when founder Irene Leroux focused on the female form, dispensing with uncomfortable boning and padding when she launched her brand in 1968. Naturally, the “Chanel of swimwear” is a master at crafting quality lingerie.

t: Shoppers Say Their Skin "Looks and Feels Better" After Using This $10 Firming Tanning Lotion
s: The Jergens Natural Glow Firming Self Tanner is a moisturizer that imparts a natural-looking bronze and firms and tones skin thanks toe collagen, elastin, and green tea extracts. Shop the lotion at Amazon for $10.
